column3: Represents net income less (i) earnings allocated to participating share awards of $  54  million, $  21  million and $  43  million for the years ended December 31, 2018  , 2017  and 2016  , respectively, and (ii) dividends on preferred  shares of $  80  millio  n, $  81  million and $  80  million for  the years ended December 31, 2018  , 2017  and 2016  ,  r  e  s  p  e  c  t  i  v  e  l  y  .
